description.title: ZLib: A Massively Spiffy Yet Delicately Unobtrusive Compression Library (docs)
description.paragraph: The zlib compression library provides in-memory compression and decompression functions, including integrity checks of the uncompressed data. The mingw32-zlib package provides documentation related to the ZLib library. The runtime and development files are provided by the associated mingw32-libz package.

description.title: ZLib: A Massively Spiffy Yet Delicately Unobtrusive Compression Library
description.paragraph: The zlib compression library provides in-memory compression and decompression functions, including integrity checks of the uncompressed data. The libz package provides the runtime and development files related to the ZLib library. The associated zlib package provides documentation.
